resources.string: University at Buffalo Social Work Reader
News from the University at Buffalo School of Social Work
An article you should look at
Developed on behalf of the University at Buffalo School of Social Work (http://www.socialwork.buffalo.edu/).\nDeveloped by Bexkat Systems LLC (http://www.bexkat.com/).

Swipe left or right to change news feeds, or select a specific news feed from the tab list above. To mark an article as a "favorite," long press the item in the list view and choose "favorite" from the menu. You can also share an article in the same way by choosing the share icon. You can get more information about the news feeds by choosing "Descriptions" from the menu.
